original_text: And you shall eat the fruit of your womb, the flesh of your sons and daughters, whom the Lord your God has given you, in the siege and in the distress with which your enemies shall distress you.
korean_text: 네가 적군에게 에워싸이고 맹렬한 공격을 받아 곤란을 당하므로 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주신 자녀 곧 네 몸의 소생의 살을 먹을 것이라

sentences.original_text: And you shall eat the fruit of your womb
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 네 몸의 열매를 먹을 것이다

sentences.original_text: the flesh of your sons and daughters
whom the Lord your God has given you
sentences.korean_translation: 주 너의 하나님이 너에게 주신 자들을

sentences.original_text: in the siege and in the distress
with which your enemies shall distress you
